Key Match Events: Kerry Carpenter matched a career high with four hits
Romo singled to center in the 7th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kerry Carpenter's 4 hits lead surging Tigers past Rockies, 7-4
The Detroit Tigers kept pace in the AL wild-card race with a 7-4 win over the Colorado Rockies on Wednesday night
Others: The game was played at Comerica Park in Detroit, Michigan, with an attendance of 18,847
The final score was 7-4 in favor of the Tigers
Tanner Gordon of the Rockies suffered his 6th loss of the season
